miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to impale your %2$s, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to impale <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s tries to impale your %2$s, but fails to penetrate your armor!
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s tries to impale <npcname>, but fails to penetrate their armor!

miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to peck you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to peck <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s tries to peck your %2$s, but fails to penetrate your armor!
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s tries to peck <npcname>, but fails to penetrate their armor!

no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s's tentacle lashes out at you without doing any damage.
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s's tentacle lashes out at <npcname> without doing any damage.
miss_msg_u: %s's tentacle snaps at you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %s's tentacle snaps at <npcname>, but they dodge!

hit_dmg_u: %1$s snaps its barbed tentacle at your %2$s!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s's barbed tentacle lashes out at you without doing any damage.
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s's barbed tentacle lashes out at <npcname> without doing any damage.
miss_msg_u: %s's barbed tentacle snaps at you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %s's barbed tentacle snaps at <npcname>, but they dodge!

hit_dmg_u: %1$s snaps its long barbed tentacle at your %2$s!
hit_dmg_npc: %1$s snaps its long barbed tentacle at <npcname>!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s's long barbed tentacle lashes out at you without doing any damage.
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s's long barbed tentacle lashes out at <npcname> without doing any damage.
miss_msg_u: %s's long barbed tentacle snaps at you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %s's long barbed tentacle snaps at <npcname>, but they dodge!

//: No stun on miss/obstacle unlike in the hardcoded attack, raised movecost to compensate
hit_dmg_u: %1$s's head shoots out, and its teeth sink into your %2$s!
hit_dmg_npc: %1$s's head shoots out, and its teeth sink into <npcname>!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s's head hits your %2$s, but glances off your armor!
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s's head hits <npcname>, but glances off their armor!
miss_msg_u: %s's head extends to bite you, but you dodge and the head sails past!
miss_msg_npc: %s's head extends to bite <npcname>, but they dodge and the head sails past!

hit_dmg_u: %1$s thrusts its arms at you, and its claws pierce your %2$s!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s's arms hit your %2$s, but they glance off your armor!
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s's arms hit <npcname>, but they glance off their armor!
miss_msg_u: %s thrusts its arms at you, but you evade the stretched arm!
miss_msg_npc: %s's thrusts its arms at <npcname>, but they dodge!

hit_dmg_u: %1$s stares at you intently and a sudden wind buffets you!
hit_dmg_npc: %1$s stares intently at <npcname> and a hurricane force wind hits them!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s's wind buffets your %2$s, but it doesn't catch hold!
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s's winds hit <npcname>, but it doesn't catch hold!
miss_msg_u: %s stares at you, but you the wind bursts past you!
miss_msg_npc: %s's stares at <npcname>, but the wind blows past them!

hit_dmg_u: %1$s thrusts a claw at your %2$s, slashing it!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s thrusts a claw at your %2$s, but glances off your armor!
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s thrusts a claw at <npcname>, but glances off their armor!
miss_msg_u: %s thrusts a claw at you, but you evade it!
miss_msg_npc: %s thrusts a claw at <npcname>, but they evade it!

hit_dmg_u: %1$s slashes at your neck, cutting your throat!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s slashes at your neck, but glances off your armor!
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s slashes at <npcname>, but glances off armor!
miss_msg_u: %s slashes at your neck!  You duck!

hit_dmg_u: %1$s takes a powerful swing at your %2$s, pulverizing it!
no_dmg_msg_u: %s takes a swing at you, but it's blunted by your armor.
no_dmg_msg_npc: %s takes a swing at <npcname>, but they appear unharmed.
miss_msg_u: %s takes a powerful swing at you, but you dodge it!
miss_msg_npc: %s takes a powerful swing at <npcname>, who dodges it!

no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s rams your %2$s, but you hold steady!
miss_msg_u: %s flicks its horns at you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %s flicks its horns at <npcname>, but they dodge!

miss_msg_u: %1$s claws at you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to claw at <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s claws at your %2$s, but fails to penetrate armor.
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s tries to claw at <npcname>, but fails to penetrate armor.

miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to slam into you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries slam into <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s slams into your %2$s, but your armor protects you.
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s slams into <npcname>, but their armor protects them.

miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to sting you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to sting <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s tries to sting your %2$s, but it fails to penetrate your armor.
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s tries to sting <npcname>, but it fails to penetrate their armor.

hit_dmg_u: %1$s's stinger tail whips out and hits your %2$s!
miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to sting you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to sting <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s tries to sting <npcname>, but it fails to penetrate their armor.

miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to gore you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to gore <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s rams its antlers into your %2$s, but it bounces off your armor.
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s tries to gore <npcname>, but it fails to penetrate their armor.

miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to kick you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to kick <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s kicks your %2$s, but it's dampened by your armor.
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s kicks <npcname>, but fails to penetrate their armor.

hit_dmg_u: %s grasps at you with silk-covered legs, engulfing you in sticky webs!
hit_dmg_npc: %s grabs <npcname> and covers them in sticky webs!
miss_msg_u: %s tries to grab you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %s tries to grab <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %s grasps at you with silk-covered legs, engulfing you in sticky webs!
no_dmg_msg_npc: %s grabs <npcname> and covers them in sticky webs!
